meanings.definition: A representation of the Hindu deity Shiva in the form of a phallus.
meanings.sent1: During the festival, the priest adorned the lingam with colorful flowers.

meanings.sent4: The lingam stood tall and proud, symbolizing strength and fertility.
meanings.sent5: The intricate carvings on the lingam depicted stories from ancient myths.
